Relationships.Reason: King Francis I., who was accustomed frequently and affectionately to visit him
Leonardo is described as the noble Milanese, painter, engineer, and architect.
former Professor of Painting to the Duke of Milan
Leonardo was the first to investigate scientifically and to apply to art the laws of light and shade
Leonardo was thus in the forefront of the Florentine Renaissance
King Francis I., who was accustomed frequently and affectionately to visit him
Thus died "Mr. Lionard de Vincy, the noble Milanese
"former Professor of Painting to the Duke of Milan."
He observed with strict accuracy the subtleties of chiaroscuro
Leonardo, whose birth antedates that of Michelangelo and Raphael by twenty three and thirty-one years respectively, was thus in the forefront of the Florentine Renaissance.
departed in the arms of the monarch
wrote his friend and assistant Francesco Melzi
the preliminary investigations of Piero della Francesca deserve to be recorded
the King was in all probability on that date at St. Germain-en-Laye
